original: @186b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @186b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya badzra sva ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya badzra sva ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
translated: Āryavajra-sārasvatī-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining Noble Vajra Sarasvatī

original: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Vajra Sarasvatī!

original: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas gsungs gsal sbyin yon tan rang bzhin rdo rje dbyangs can mar btung nas //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas gsungs gsal sbyin yon tan rang bzhin rdo rje dbyangs can mar btung nas //
translated: Having drunk the nature of the qualities of the perfect, complete Buddha's speech, Sarasvatī,

original: rang la phan pa yang dag sgrub mdzad mdzes pa'i nyams lnga rtsod pas thub par dka' mdzad ma //
analyzed: rang la phan pa yang dag sgrub mdzad mdzes pa'i nyams lnga rtsod pas thub par dka' mdzad ma //
translated: she who accomplishes perfect benefit for herself, with the five beautiful experiences, difficult to overcome by opponents,

original: de yi sgrub thabs 'di ni kun nas yang dag mi bzad mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: de yi sgrub thabs 'di ni kun nas yang dag mi bzad mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad pa //
translated: her means of attainment, this, which completely destroys the unbearable darkness of ignorance,

original: blo ngan rnams kyis @187a * //
analyzed: blo ngan rnams kyis @187a * //
translated: in order that it be understood by those of poor intellect,

original: rtogs phyir sems can phan phyir legs par gsungs pa'i cho gas bshad par bya //
analyzed: rtogs phyir sems can phan phyir legs par gsungs pa'i cho gas bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain it through the method of the well-spoken ritual, for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: dang por snga bar kha la sogs pa dag pa'i rang bzhin snying rje dang ldan bzod ldan pas //
analyzed: dang por snga bar kha la sogs pa dag pa'i rang bzhin snying rje dang ldan bzod ldan pas //
translated: First, early in the morning, with a compassionate nature, patient, pure of mouth and so forth,

original: sngags pas gtsang ba'i stan la byams pa'i dga' bas myos shing gang zhig dga' ba dang ldan pas //
analyzed: sngags pas gtsang ba'i stan la byams pa'i dga' bas myos shing gang zhig dga' ba dang ldan pas //
translated: The mantrin, intoxicated with the joy of love on a pure seat,

original: gnas kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben bar yang ni rang gi snying gar chu skyes blta bar bya //
analyzed: gnas kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben bar yang ni rang gi snying gar chu skyes blta bar bya //
translated: should visualize the lotus in his heart, which is also delightful and secluded.

original: de las sprul pa las byung ri bong 'dzin pa yang dag bsgom par bya'o de la yang //
analyzed: de las sprul pa las byung ri bong 'dzin pa yang dag bsgom par bya'o de la yang //
translated: From that, he should visualize the moon arisen from the emanation,

original: do:yig 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs dang bar rnams kyang ni 'di yis yongs su gang bar gyur //
analyzed: do:yig 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs dang bar rnams kyang ni 'di yis yongs su gang bar gyur //
translated: and the directions and intermediate directions are completely filled with the light rays of the syllable oṃ.

original: de nas sangs rgyas tshogs rnams mdun du bltas nas 'dir ni mchod phal sogs bsgom par bya //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas tshogs rnams mdun du bltas nas 'dir ni mchod phal sogs bsgom par bya //
translated: Then, seeing the assembly of Buddhas in front, he should meditate on the offerings here and so forth.

original: me tog la sogs de nas phyag 'tshal slar yang 'dir ni sdigs pa rab tu bshags pa bya //
analyzed: me tog la sogs de nas phyag 'tshal slar yang 'dir ni sdigs pa rab tu bshags pa bya //
translated: Then, having offered flowers and so forth, he should prostrate and confess his faults here again.

original: de bzhin bsod nams rjes su yi rang sngags rig pa yis gsum la skyabs su yang dag 'gro //
analyzed: de bzhin bsod nams rjes su yi rang sngags rig pa yis gsum la skyabs su yang dag 'gro //
translated: Likewise, the mantrin should rejoice in the merit and go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: zhes pa la sogs smon lam legs btab de yis bdag nyid kyang ni dmigs pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs smon lam legs btab de yis bdag nyid kyang ni dmigs pa rab tu bya //
translated: Having made such excellent prayers, one should also visualize oneself as the deity.

original: gcig dang du ma dang bral rang bzhin yongs su brjod pa dri med yang dag shes rtogs pa //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma dang bral rang bzhin yongs su brjod pa dri med yang dag shes rtogs pa //
translated: Having realized the stainless, perfect knowledge that is the nature free from one and many,

original: de nas sna tshogs rnam rtog dra ba ma lus thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sna tshogs rnam rtog dra ba ma lus thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: then one should meditate on the entire net of various thoughts as emptiness.

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāvātmako ’haṃ

original: stong pa nyid las byung ba chu skyes dang ni zla ba la gnas do:yig dmar po ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las byung ba chu skyes dang ni zla ba la gnas do:yig dmar po ste /
translated: From emptiness arises a lotus and moon, upon which is a red A.

original: slar yang sna tshogs 'od zer tshogs rnams shin tu mdzes par gyur pa'i padma 'dab brgya da pa //
analyzed: slar yang sna tshogs 'od zer tshogs rnams shin tu mdzes par gyur pa'i padma 'dab brgya da pa //
translated: Again, from that arise a hundred-petaled lotus and moon,

original: de la dmar zhing 'od zer chen po dang ldan bcom ldan 'das ma mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
analyzed: de la dmar zhing 'od zer chen po dang ldan bcom ldan 'das ma mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
translated: upon which is the Bhagavatī, beautiful, adorned with ornaments,

original: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis yang dag gnas shing zhal gsum phyag drug gis ni rab brgyan pa //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis yang dag gnas shing zhal gsum phyag drug gis ni rab brgyan pa //
translated: standing with her left leg straight, with three faces and six arms,

original: g-yas pa'i zhal ni sngo zhing phyag na padma ral gri gri gug rab tu bsnams pa ste //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i zhal ni sngo zhing phyag na padma ral gri gri gug rab tu bsnams pa ste //
translated: The right face is blue, and he holds a lotus, a sword, and a flaying knife.

original: g-yon zhal dkar zhing phyag na lhung bzed dang bcas rin chen bzang dang 'khor lo de bzhin no //
analyzed: g-yon zhal dkar zhing phyag na lhung bzed dang bcas rin chen bzang dang 'khor lo de bzhin no //
translated: The left face is white, and he holds a skull cup, a jewel, and a chakram.

original: snying gar padma la gnas zla ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i der yang do:yig 'od gsal bas //
analyzed: snying gar padma la gnas zla ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i der yang do:yig 'od gsal bas //
translated: In his heart, on a lotus and moon seat, is a syllable DROM, shining with light.

original: sna tshogs mi shes mun ba 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyis ni 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs mdzad pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs mi shes mun ba 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyis ni 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs mdzad pa //
translated: It fills all beings with light that conquers the darkness of ignorance.

original: yang dag bsdus la rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas sa bon bltas la slar yang spro//
analyzed: yang dag bsdus la rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas sa bon bltas la slar yang spro//
translated: Gathering it back, one should look at the seed syllable in one’s heart, on a moon seat, and then emanate it again.

original: @187b de nyid yang dang yang du rtag tu snyom las med par nyi ma so sor bsam par bya //
analyzed: @187b de nyid yang dang yang du rtag tu snyom las med par nyi ma so sor bsam par bya //
translated: One should always meditate on it, day after day, without laziness, again and again.

original: bsam gtan ngal na sa bon mnyam skyes bsdus la sngags 'di yis ni bzlas pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: bsam gtan ngal na sa bon mnyam skyes bsdus la sngags 'di yis ni bzlas pa rab tu bya //
translated: When one is tired of meditation, one should gather back the seed syllable, and recite the mantra.

original: do shal g-yo zhing nyin byed rim pas 'byung ba'i yid bzhin du ni sngags kyis bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: do shal g-yo zhing nyin byed rim pas 'byung ba'i yid bzhin du ni sngags kyis bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra as one wishes, with a garland swaying, in the manner of the rising sun.

original: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradznya wardha ni /
analyzed: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradznya wardha ni /
translated: Oṃ picu picu prajñāvardhani

original: dzra la dzva la /
analyzed: dzra la dzva la /
translated: jvala jvālā

original: me dha wardha ni /
analyzed: me dha wardha ni /
translated: medhāvardhani

original: dhi ri dhi ri budhi wardha ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: dhi ri dhi ri budhi wardha ni sv'a h'a /
translated: dhi ri dhi ri budhivardhani svāhā.

original: thun mtshams thams cad du ni lha mo'i sku la yid ni rtag tu rab tu dga' ba yis //
analyzed: thun mtshams thams cad du ni lha mo'i sku la yid ni rtag tu rab tu dga' ba yis //
translated: In all the sessions, with a mind that is always delighted, in the body of the goddess,

original: yang dag gsungs pa'i cho gas sems can rnams gyi don gyur sngags 'di yongs su bzlas par bya //
analyzed: yang dag gsungs pa'i cho gas sems can rnams gyi don gyur sngags 'di yongs su bzlas par bya //
translated: Recite this mantra that accomplishes the welfare of sentient beings, according to the prescribed ritual.

original: bsod nams kyang ni yongs su bsngo bya dgos pa byed na bsam gtan rtse gcig gnas par spyod //
analyzed: bsod nams kyang ni yongs su bsngo bya dgos pa byed na bsam gtan rtse gcig gnas par spyod //
translated: If one has any duties to fulfill, one should engage in single-pointed concentration.

original: ji srid 'bum phrag yongs su ma rdzogs pa'am rdzogs nas kyang ni las kyi rim bzhin bya //
analyzed: ji srid 'bum phrag yongs su ma rdzogs pa'am rdzogs nas kyang ni las kyi rim bzhin bya //
translated: Until one has completed one hundred thousand recitations, or after completion, one should perform the rites as prescribed.

original: rnam pa thams cad du ni mi mthun phyogs su nye bar yang yang de nyid bsam gtan byed //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du ni mi mthun phyogs su nye bar yang yang de nyid bsam gtan byed //
translated: In all circumstances, one should cultivate concentration on that very [mantra], avoiding unfavorable conditions.

original: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas ni shin tu dge ba'i yid kyis ji srid zla ba gnas kyi bar //
analyzed: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas ni shin tu dge ba'i yid kyis ji srid zla ba gnas kyi bar //
translated: From the first day of the bright fortnight, with a very virtuous mind, until the moon is full,

original: de srid legs spyar de bzhin nub re bzhin du ji srid zla ba gang ba bzhin du bya //
analyzed: de srid legs spyar de bzhin nub re bzhin du ji srid zla ba gang ba bzhin du bya //
translated: One should practice in this way every night until the moon is full.

original: de nyid kyi ni mtshan mo thub par dka' ba'i snyan ngag mkhan gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ni mtshan mo thub par dka' ba'i snyan ngag mkhan gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
translated: On that very night, one will attain the state of a poet difficult to subdue.

original: gang zhig dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud la gnas shing dpal ldan nag po'i gzi brjid kyis //
analyzed: gang zhig dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud la gnas shing dpal ldan nag po'i gzi brjid kyis //
translated: One who abides in the glorious Yamari Tantra, with the splendor of glorious Krishna,

original: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can bcom ldan 'das ma de yi yang dag sgrub pa'i thabs gyur pa //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can bcom ldan 'das ma de yi yang dag sgrub pa'i thabs gyur pa //
translated: and the means of accomplishing the glorious Vajra Sarasvati,

original: sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du bdag gis brtsams pa'i bsod nams yang dag thob gyur pa //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du bdag gis brtsams pa'i bsod nams yang dag thob gyur pa //
translated: the merit I have attained by composing this for the benefit of sentient beings,

original: de yis 'gro rnams nag po lta bur thub par dka' ba'i snyan ngag mkhan du grub par shog / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dpal 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: de yis 'gro rnams nag po lta bur thub par dka' ba'i snyan ngag mkhan du grub par shog / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dpal 'dzin gyis //
translated: may that cause beings to become poets difficult to subdue, like Krishna.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can gyi //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can gyi //
translated: By the glorious Vajra Sarasvati,

original: 'joms byed mthar ni byed pa yi //
analyzed: 'joms byed mthar ni byed pa yi //
translated: the means of accomplishment of the destroyer,

original: sgrub pa'i thabs ni legs byas so //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs ni legs byas so //
translated: has been well composed.

original: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of the noble Vajra Sarasvatī composed by the master Śrīdhara is complete.
